amendment.description: Amendment includes the development of solar technology products that are water efficient as a focus of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-304 to include the development of solar technology products that are water efficient as a focus of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 407 - 9 (Roll no. 804).
